articles.author: Robin McKie
articles.title: Revealed: modern humans needed three tries – and 12,000 years – to colonise Europe - The Guardian
articles.description: Homo sapiens forced out Neanderthals between 54,000 and 42,000 years ago, according to controversial new research
articles.content: It took three separate waves of modern humans to colonise Europe between 54,000 and 42,000 years ago. That is the key conclusion of scientists who have been studying caves in the Rhone valley where t… [+9328 chars]
